content: created in red heart super saver super craft kit this mouthwatering cupcake ornament sweetens any holiday display materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit™ kit includes 12 balls 1 7 oz/50 g each 21 oz/600g total yardage 93 yds/85 m each 1116 yds/1020 m total contrast a shocking pink 1 ball or 7 5 yds/7 m contrast b cafe latte 1 ball or 5 5 yds/5 m contrast c lavender 1 ball or 9 yds/8 5 m contrast d soft white 1 ball or 9 yds/8 5 m contrast e cherry red 1 ball or 4 yds/3 5 m contrast f black 1 ball or ½ yds/0 5 m measurement approx 3 7 5 cm tall excluding hanging loop
